AT.name: Pumped BMX +
AT.description: Pumped BMX + baut auf dem Spiel „Pumped BMX 2“. Alles, was das mobile Spiel so erfolgreich gemacht hat, wurde aufgegriffen und für die Konsole weiter verbessert. Das Spiel wurde vom Einmannstudio Yeah Us! entwickelt. In Pumped BMX + fahren Spieler durch immer anspruchsvollere Level und reihen dabei waghalsige und beeindruckende Tricks aneinander. Spieler können beim Fahren ihrem persönlichen Stil Ausdruck verleihen und in über 500 Herausforderungen ihre besten Stunts üben, um die Bestenlisten zu stürmen. - Schön gerenderte 3D-Grafik und Animationen in HD - Neue verbesserte, intelligente Steuerung - Brandneuer voll lizenzierter Soundtrack - Jede Menge authentischer BMX-Tricks können kombiniert werden – der Fantasie sind fast keine Grenzen gesetzt!

AU.name: Pumped BMX +
AU.description: Pumped BMX + uses the hit game 'Pumped BMX 2' as inspiration - taking everything which made the mobile version so successful and enhancing every aspect of it for console. Originally developed by one man studio Yeah Us!, Pumped BMX + sees players ride their way through increasingly challenging levels while pulling off crazy and impressive trick combinations. The game lets players choose their rider style and throw down their best stunts whilst racing through more than 500 challenges to reach the top of the leader boards. - Beautifully rendered 3D high definition graphics and animation - A new enhanced and intelligent control system - A brand new fully licensed soundtrack - Loads of authentic BMX tricks which can be combined for almost unlimited creativity

BG.name: Pumped BMX +

BE.name: Pumped BMX +
BE.description: Pumped BMX + s'inspire du jeu à succès "Pumped BMX 2" pour retranscrire et améliorer tout ce qui a fait le succès de cette application sur console. Développé à la base par le studio Yeah Us! composé d'une seule personne, Pumped BMX + propose des niveaux de plus en plus durs et des tricks impressionnants. Le jeu permet de choisir son style de rider et de réussir ses meilleurs enchaînements à travers plus de 500 défis pour atteindre le haut des classements. - Graphismes et animation HD 3D magnifiques - Commandes intelligentes améliorées - Nouvelle bande-son aux titres sous licence - Des tas d'authentiques tricks de BMX à combiner à l'infini

ES.name: Pumped BMX +
ES.description: Pumped BMX + se inspira en el juego de éxito para móvil Pumped BMX 2, coge todo lo que triunfó de la versión para móvil y mejora todos sus aspectos para las consolas. Originalmente desarrollado por el estudio formado por un solo hombre Yeah Us!, en Pumped BMX + los jugadores pilotan en niveles de dificultad ascendiente mientras realizan impresionantes combinaciones de piruetas. El juego permite a los jugadores elegir su estilo de piloto y mostrar sus mejores acrobacias mientras conducen a través de más de 500 desafíos para llegar a lo más alto de las tablas de clasificación. - Maravillosos gráficos y animación 3D en alta definición - Nuevo sistema de control inteligente mejorado - Nueva banda sonora con licencia - Montones de auténticas piruetas de BMX que se pueden combinar para obtener una creatividad casi ilimitada.

IT.name: Pumped BMX +
IT.description: Pumped BMX + mantiene tutto ciò che ha reso la versione di "Pumped BMX 2" un tale successo e ne migliora ogni aspetto per la sua versione console. Sviluppato originariamente da uno studio composto da una sola persona, Yeah Us!, Pumped BMX + vede i giocatori pedalare attraverso livelli sempre più difficili e sfoggiare svariate mosse, una più folle e impressionante dell'altra. I giocatori sono inoltre liberi di personalizzare lo stile del proprio atleta e di eseguire le loro acrobazie migliori mentre gareggiano nelle oltre 500 sfide che li porteranno a scalare le classifiche. - Splendide animazioni e grafica 3D ad alta definizione. - Nuovo e intelligente sistema di controllo. - Colonna sonora su licenza nuova di zecca. - Tantissime acrobazie BMX, tutte autentiche, tutte da incorporare. Le possibilità sono praticamente infinite.

NL.name: Pumped BMX +
NL.description: Pumped BMX + gebruikt de populaire game 'Pumped BMX 2' als inspiratie en neemt alles wat de mobiele versie tot zo'n succes mee naar de console. In Pumped BMX +, oorspronkelijk ontwikkeld door eenmansbedrijf Yeah US! moeten spelers zich door lastige levels werken en de meest waanzinnige en indrukwekkende combinaties van tricks uitvoeren. Spelers kunnen hun eigen stijl kiezen en hun beste stunts laten zien tijdens het racen in meer dan 500 uitdagingen om de top van het klassement te bereiken. - Schitterende high-definition 3D-graphics en animaties - Een verbeterd en intelligent besturingssysteem - Een gloednieuwe volledig gelicentieerde soundtrack - Tal van BMX-tricks die met elkaar kunnen worden gecombineerd voor eindeloze creativiteit

NZ.name: Pumped BMX +
NZ.description: Pumped BMX + uses the hit game 'Pumped BMX 2' as inspiration - taking everything which made the mobile version so successful and enhancing every aspect of it for console. Originally developed by one man studio Yeah Us!, Pumped BMX + sees players ride their way through increasingly challenging levels while pulling off crazy and impressive trick combinations. The game lets players choose their rider style and throw down their best stunts whilst racing through more than 500 challenges to reach the top of the leader boards. - Beautifully rendered 3D high definition graphics and animation - A new enhanced and intelligent control system - A brand new fully licensed soundtrack - Loads of authentic BMX tricks which can be combined for almost unlimited creativity

PL.name: Pumped BMX +
PL.description: Pumped BMX + uses the hit game 'Pumped BMX 2' as inspiration - taking everything which made the mobile version so successful and enhancing every aspect of it for console. Originally developed by one man studio Yeah Us!, Pumped BMX + sees players ride their way through increasingly challenging levels while pulling off crazy and impressive trick combinations. The game lets players choose their rider style and throw down their best stunts whilst racing through more than 500 challenges to reach the top of the leader boards. - Beautifully rendered 3D high definition graphics and animation - A new enhanced and intelligent control system - A brand new fully licensed soundtrack - Loads of authentic BMX tricks which can be combined for almost unlimited creativity

PT.name: Pumped BMX +
PT.description: Pumped BMX + inspira-se no 'Pumped BMX 2', o grande sucesso para mobile - pegando no que fez o sucesso da versão para mobile e melhorando tudo para consola. Originalmente desenvolvido pelo estúdio de um só programador Yeah Us!, Pumped BMX + leva os jogadores a atravessar níveis cada vez mais complexos enquanto fazem combinações de truques dementes e impressionantes. O jogo permite que os jogadores escolham o seu estilo de piloto e façam as suas melhores acrobacias em mais de 500 desafios, tentando chegar ao topo das classificações. - Gráficos e animações 3D deslumbrantes em alta definição - Um novo sistema de controlo inteligente e melhorado - Uma nova banda sonora sob licença - Montes de truques BMX autênticos que podem ser combinados de forma quase ilimitada

RU.name: Pumped BMX +
RU.description: Вдохновением для Pumped BMX + послужила игра Pumped BMX 2, от которой она взяла все лучшее. Приключенческая спортивная игра Pumped BMX + предлагает более 500 уникальных заданий, а также: - прекрасную графику и анимацию высокого разрешения в 3D - новую улучшенную систему управления - абсолютно новый лицензионный саундтрек - кучу настоящих трюков BMX, которые можно сочетать до умопомрачения
